project: Dr. Phil Mobile Chiropractic Website Rebuild

tasks.title: Update Color Theme
tasks.description: Replace template's electric-blue theme with Dr. Phil's green (#6c9932) and navy (#10315a) colors in tailwind.config.ts
tasks.notes: Updated primary color to HSL(86 50% 39%) for green #6c9932 and secondary to HSL(213 69% 20%) for navy #10315a. Fixed CSS @import order issue.

tasks.title: Add Logo & Branding Assets
tasks.description: Replace template assets with Dr. Phil logo variants and create favicon

tasks.title: Update Hero Section
tasks.description: Update Hero.tsx with chiropractic headline, new stats, and CTA buttons

tasks.title: Update Features Section
tasks.description: Adapt Services.tsx to show 3 chiropractic value propositions (Convenience, Personalized Care, Exercise Prescription)

tasks.title: Create Testimonials Carousel
tasks.description: Build Testimonials.tsx component with Embla Carousel to display customer testimonials

tasks.title: Create Pricing Component
tasks.description: Build Pricing.tsx with 3-tier pricing cards ($125, $75, $50) and discount section

tasks.title: Create Doctor Profile Component
tasks.description: Build DoctorProfile.tsx with photo, credentials, and short bio

tasks.title: Create Service Area Map Component
tasks.description: Build ServiceAreaMap.tsx showing 11 service cities in Utah

tasks.title: Update Contact Component
tasks.description: Update Contact.tsx with Dr. Phil's contact info (phone, email) and form fields

tasks.title: Create About Page
tasks.description: Build About.tsx page with full doctor biography, certifications, and photo carousel

tasks.title: Create Why House Calls Page
tasks.description: Build WhyHouseCalls.tsx with value proposition and benefits grid

tasks.title: Setup React Router
tasks.description: Install react-router-dom and create routing structure for all pages

tasks.title: Update SEO Meta Tags
tasks.description: Update HTML meta tags, titles, descriptions, and Open Graph tags
